questions.question: We can see ............................ glass.
questions.description: Through shows movement from one side to the other. Threw is the past tense of throw.

questions.question: He let out a ..........................
questions.description: A groan is a deep sound of pain.

questions.question: When two ..................... lines meet we get an angle.
questions.description: A strait is a narrow passage of water connecting two seas.

questions.question: Archimedes discovered a new ..................
questions.description: A principle is a scientific theorem.

questions.question: He is sick and .................... special care and attention.
questions.description: To knead is to work dough with hands.

questions.question: Horses like to ....................... on their back.
questions.description: To roll is to move by turning over and over.

questions.question: In the cricket match Team India ...................... Team Australia.
questions.description: You beat someone to win something. You don't win someone.

questions.question: We will have to hire a ............................... if we have so many guests.
questions.description: A cooker is an appliance for cooking food.

questions.question: There is a huge mango tree ............................... my house.
questions.description: We use 'in front of' to talk about place. 'Before' is mainly used to talk about time.

questions.question: The number of students who wanted to ........................ the lab was in ....................... of three hundred.
questions.description: To access is to enter a place. Excess means an amount that is more than allowed.

questions.question: She told many funny ..........................
questions.description: An anecdote is a short, entertaining story.
